metadata.name: Sustain Inner Connection
metadata.description:
[Spring] Redthread Vision in 4 seasons

We are all superstars when we realized how powerful we are. We may forget and get distracted by the noise outside. When you sustain focus on an inner vision of yourself, you can be anything. “Redthread AI Vision” is for Outdoor IRL Installations in 4 Seasons of Nature. This piece features Spring. Inspired by an Asian ancient belief, “Invisible Redthread connects all who are destined to meet.”, Including the best version of yourself, the shining superstar.
